User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.0; WOW64; rv:8.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0
Build ID: 20111104165243

Steps to reproduce:

When Firefox transforms XML via a XSLT stylesheet, the only option in the context menu (or the View menu) is "View Source".  That works for HTML, but not here.  I would rather see "View XML file source", "View XML stylesheet", and "View processed page source".


Actual results:

The only context menu available (unless you select some text in the output) is "View Source" which is mainly for HTML.


Expected results:

The options listed should be more relevant.  I suggest these:
* View XML file source
* View XML stylesheet
* View processed page source
comments.creator: will.pittenger1+mozbugzilla@gmail.com
